topics.body:
Another reason I don't like it when Max has his Streams on Sub only mode is _Some_ of the Subs then begin to think they can talk Shit on the people that aren't subbed. (Which again subbing is not free and costs five bucks, and its only temporary so you are not even subbed all the time) 

So you sometimes get stupid assholes that are subbed to Max saying shit like 

"cause you non subs don't appreciate ***" And I'm sitting here getting discouraged like, dude what the hell? Just because I don't pay to be subbed every single month doesn't mean you can talk shit on me like that.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

I really hate people like that. It's as if they forget that not everyone has an infinite amount of disposable income and have to pick and choose what we spend our money on.
topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55014372636872702d640700#post_55014372636872702d640700
Dad's are awesome though.
This one time:
"Jeff I can't believe you. You killed that poor defenseless creature with over a hundred bullets. It's like I don't even know you anymore."

"Dad, you don't even sound like that. Your English sucks, remember?"

Then I woke up.
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/550143c16368727e26650800#post_550143c16368727e26650800
*Its super shitty*.

Like I love Max but sub only mode is the worst. It honestly Makes me leave some of his Streams when he puts it on sometimes. 

Because it takes the fun away from some people including myself. 

And then makes some Subbers Mock the fact that the rest of us only get to _sit and watch_.

It doesn't happen that often now but there was a point that I literally took a break from Max because I felt he was unfairly turning on Sub only mode.

He even let one of his top Donators decide weather they should put the stream on sub only mode one time because some of the chat was acting up. (Thank god he was a nice guy and said let the none sub's stay on)

It was a terribly time. And I'm not going to lie about it. I'm glad he doesn't do it that often now.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/550144b163687202ae6e0500#post_550144b163687202ae6e0500
EXACTLY.

Its terrible. And its annoying too. 

Like I love the guy but he needs to fix that shit. like I shouldn't have to worry about getting turned into sub only Just because some people are being assholes.

Because that's what mods are for and that's what Mods *banning* people are for. 

Also if you really must go on Sub only mode he should tell his Subbers to not be dicks.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
My driver coach had a day off today so he was replaced with a younger teacher.

He was more strict than my usual and he even insults me and put words in my mouth. He said that I didn't like his teaching and that I think that I'm always right when the only thing I said was that my family taught me to drive like this.

I almost cried and depressed.

> And you cannot nope hard enough
> And you close the tab so hard you almost break your mouse

You know that feeling?
